text: 10:5 1 Korin 1:19; 3:19Egha e ifavarir akaba, ko nɨghnɨzir guar avɨriba dɨkabɨri. Nɨghnɨzir kaba, gumazamiziba Godɨn fofozim iniasava amima, da men tuaviba apɨri. Ezɨ e gumazamizibar nɨghnɨziba ikiagharɨsi, mati me gumazir kuram isa kalabus gatɨ. Egh e men nɨghnɨzibar amightɨ, men nɨghnɨziba Kraisɨn akamɨn gɨrara mangam.
